name: Littletown Journey
description:
This is a prototype for a casual train driving game. There is one map currently, with a handful of stations and tracks to explore.

Controls:

Speed up
WSlow down
SReverse (when fully stopped)
RLightsLHornSpaceControl next switch (when the train rolls over it)
A / D
Toggle the UI
VToggle the Minimap
MZoomPage up / Page down
Scroll wheel

The mouse can also be used to operate the train controls, or to toggle the switches.

Some trees have birds in them, they can be startled if you drive too fast or honk near by. Stopping at a station with an exclamation point will pick up and drop off the passengers.

Related /r/godot post: https://www.reddit.com/r/godot/comments/q349k3/been_working_on_a_relaxing_train_...
